name: Fröhliche Schatzjagd!
description:
Treasures sure are great!

Everyone wants them! Yet only a select few dare to actually hunt for them - the adventurous Treasure Hunters!

When the Treasure Cave, a magical place with seemingly inexhaustible amounts of wealth and other treasures, was discovered, Treasure Hunters from all over the world flocked to a nearby village like moths to a lantern and started looting the cave to their heart's content.                                                                                                                                                                                         
Semi is one such Treasure Hunter, the youngest and most adventurous of the bunch. Will her expeditions into the Treasure Cave make her rich beyond comparison and revered among all Treasure Hunters, or will she find the traps, monsters and other dangers within the Cave to be too much for her?

Features

* Randomized Dungeons - no expedition is like the other!

* 5 floors, each with radically different enemies, gimmicks and bosses!

* A complex, pixel-based action battle system with dozens of weapons and other items to use!

* A grand total of ~350 different items, some active, some passive, all completely unique!

* Spend your collected money in the village outside the Treasure Cave to improve your next expedition or achieve permanent progress!

* "Special" rooms in the form of allies helping you out in various forms!

* Playable in English and German!

* And a lot more to discover! Rumors have it that deep within the Treasure Cave, beyond were any Treasure Hunter ever ventured, the "Greatest Treasure of them all" lies hidden. What might one have to do to claim that treasure? Only one way to find out!
